vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ψῑχ-ίον, τό,
diminutive of ψίξ, crumb, NT.Matt.15.27.
__2 of stomachic residue after emesis, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
crumb, very small piece
a morsel, crumb, bit, very small piece Mt. 15:27; Mk. 7:28*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: migaja, pedazo (de pan; LUC.16:21 - algunos manuscritos) ; migaja pequeña, pizca (de comida)
